EnableUI.Name: Enable BG3 Hotbar UI
EnableUI.Hint: Enable or disable the BG3-style hotbar interface. Disable this if you prefer to use a different hotbar module or the default Foundry hotbar.

CollapseFoundryMacrobar.Name: Start Foundry Macrobar Collapsed
CollapseFoundryMacrobar.Hint: Automatically collapse the default Foundry macrobar when loading

ShowPassiveFeaturesContainer.Name: Show Passive Features Container
ShowPassiveFeaturesContainer.Hint: Display the container of passive features above the portrait

TooltipDelay.Name: Tooltip Delay
TooltipDelay.Hint: How long to wait before showing tooltips (in milliseconds)

FadeOutDelay.Name: Fade Out Delay
FadeOutDelay.Hint: Seconds to wait before fading out the hotbar

NormalOpacity.Name: Normal Opacity
NormalOpacity.Hint: Opacity of the hotbar when mouse is over it (0.1 to 1.0)

FadedOpacity.Name: Faded Opacity
FadedOpacity.Hint: Opacity of the hotbar when mouse is not over it (0.0 to 1.0). Set to 1 to disable fading completely.

AutoPopulateUnlinkedTokens.Name: Auto-Populate Unlinked Tokens
AutoPopulateUnlinkedTokens.Hint: Automatically populate the hotbar for newly created unlinked tokens based on the settings below

Container1AutoPopulate.Name: Container 1 Auto-Populate
Container1AutoPopulate.Hint: What item types to automatically populate in the first container (index 0)

Container2AutoPopulate.Name: Container 2 Auto-Populate
Container2AutoPopulate.Hint: What item types to automatically populate in the second container (index 1)

Container3AutoPopulate.Name: Container 3 Auto-Populate
Container3AutoPopulate.Hint: What item types to automatically populate in the third container (index 2)

AutoPopulateOverflow.Name: When Container is Full
AutoPopulateOverflow.Hint: Choose how to handle items when the container runs out of space.

AutoPopulateFillDirection.Name: Auto-Populate Fill Direction
AutoPopulateFillDirection.Hint: Whether to fill rows first (left to right, then down) or columns first (top to bottom, then right)
AutoPopulateFillDirection.RowFirst: Rows First (Left to Right, Then Down)
AutoPopulateFillDirection.ColumnFirst: Columns First (Top to Bottom, Then Right)

ContainerAutoPopulate.Name: Select Item Types
ContainerAutoPopulate.Hint: Choose which types of items to automatically add to this container.

HighlightStyle.Name: Highlight Style
HighlightStyle.Hint: Choose how items are highlighted when filtered

DefaultPortraitPreferences.Name: Default Portrait Display
DefaultPortraitPreferences.Hint: Choose whether to display token images or character portraits by default. This can be overridden per token. For the first time you enable this setting, it will apply to all tokens that do not have a portrait set.
